meanings.definition: A device used for beating flax or hemp to separate the fibers.
meanings.sent1: The swingles helped in separating the fibers efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Farmers used the swingles to process the flax and hemp.
meanings.sent3: The swingles were like magical wands, turning plants into fibers.
meanings.sent4: The swingles danced through the flax, teasing out the fibers.
meanings.sent5: The swingles hummed a rhythmic tune as they worked on the fibers.

meanings.definition: To beat flax or hemp with a swingle to separate the fibers.
meanings.sent1: She swingles the flax gently to avoid damaging the fibers.
meanings.sent2: They swingles the hemp vigorously to get the best quality fibers.
meanings.sent3: He swingles the flax like a pro, making it look easy.
meanings.sent4: The machine swingles the hemp with precision and speed.
meanings.sent5: Swingling requires patience and a steady hand to get the fibers just right.
